channel.title: Vector on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Vector on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 832 Flipping an Image
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 832 Question Given an n x n binary matrix image, flip the image horizontally, then invert it, and return the resulting image.

item.title: Problem 2285 Maximum Total Importance of Roads
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2285 Question You are given an integer n denoting the number of cities in a country.

item.title: Problem 1122 Relative Sort Array
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1122 Question Given two arrays arr1 and arr2, the elements of arr2 are distinct, and all elements in arr2 are also in arr1.

item.title: Problem 523 Continuous Subarray Sum
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 523 Question Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return true if nums has a good subarray or false otherwise.

item.title: Problem 1002 Find Common Characters
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1002 Question Given a string array words, return an array of all characters that show up in all strings within the words (including duplicates).

item.title: Problem 2373 Largest Local Values in a Matrix
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2373 Question You are given an n x n integer matrix grid.

item.title: Problem 3075 Maximize Happiness of Selected Children
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3075 Question You are given an array happiness of length n, and a positive integer k.

item.title: Problem 506 Relative Ranks
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 506 Question You are given an integer array score of size n, where score[i] is the score of the ith athlete in a competition.
